item.title: Keidann Family
item.description: The Keidanns are a traditional family hailing from Courland and to some extent, related to the Curonian Kings. Members # Elder Keidann # Elder Keidann, also called “Keidann The Warrior” was an ancient Kuronian warrior who supposedly lived around the 12th Century. According to oral tradition he lived with his wife and children around Aizpute and was part of his King’s retinue. He was called into campaign as the pagans went to war with the Crusaders to defend their land.
